**[Nexim Web Hosting](https://neximweb.com/)** , run by Nexim LLC. is a Colorado based provider of premium Virtual Private Servers. We have been in business since 2010 and have been hosting services for our **4,000+ happy customers** and are growing at a rapid pace. We utilize enterprise grade hardware in a datacenter that has an astounding 3 terrabits per second network backbone that spreads though most parts of North America and Europe.

**We now support BitCoin in addition to Credit Cards and PayPal!!!**

With excellent connectivity to North America, Europe and most parts of Asia, our Virtual Private Servers will provide you great latency and bandwidth needed for your Application or Game Server. With enterprise grade **DDoS protection that protects from attacks up to 480 gigabits per second or 500 million packets per second**, you can stay assured that your services will be online even in case of an extreme attacks. Our motto has always been Customer Satisfaction. We understand that customer's are what make us what we are and keeping our customers happy by providing reliable services and support. 

To celebrate the beginning of the new year 2015, we are offering **Double Ram** and **Double Disk** Space on all of our plans or up to **30% discount** if you do not need the double disk space and ram. This offer cannot be applied if you use coupons while ordering. This is a limited time offer and is only valid for the month of January, 2015. **To claim this offer, please order the plan you wish to order and open a support ticket to the Sales department and we will get the Ram and Disk Space upgraded.**

The servers are located in Beauharnois, QC, Canada at OVH's datacenter with 3TBps total network connectivity. All servers have a gigabit port. 

All servers come with advanced DDoS protection up to 480GBPS or 500 million packets per second.
